cause.description:
This is a community to support the search for missing children.
1. Abduction must end and violators must sucumb to justice
2. Mothers/fathers with missing children hopefully have more hope knowing that we as a group are on the lookout for missing children
3. siteings should be noted then reported
4. These children must be found
cause.mission: Hopefully find missing children & send them home
cause.name: Child Find Ontario
